channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Cloud Plugins -- Use-Your-Drive
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Cloud Plugins -- Use-Your-Drive

item.title: CVE-2021-42546|2024-08-04T03:38:49.264Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- use-your-drive
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Use-Your-Drive prior to 1.18.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.
